summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of NeonPub Karaoke app. All backend APIs (23/23) and frontend functionality working perfectly. Full workflow tested: pub creation, client/admin authentication, song requests, queue management, live performances, voting, quiz system, and real-time updates.
passed_tests: All 23 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with correct buttons and Italian text
Auth modal with all tabs (Cliente/Admin/Nuovo) functional
Pub creation flow with auto-fill admin login
Client join flow with nickname and pub code
Admin dashboard with all navigation sections working
Client app with all navigation tabs (Home/Songs/Leaderboard/Profile)
JWT authentication for all protected endpoints
Display data endpoint for pub monitors
